billing_date.description: Date on which the billing document was generated

company_group.description: Company under which the sales transaction is recorded. [ENTI, TWOC] ENTI = Eneos, TWOC = Tide Water Oil Corporation/Veedol

customer_number.description: Customer code representing the unique party to whom the goods are sold

billing_document.description: Unique invoice number; each invoice can have multiple records, one for each material sold.

plant.description: Plant code from which the material was dispatched

distribution_channel.description: Abbreviation of Sales distribution channel under which the customer operates [AM, DE, EC, EN, EX, IN, OE, OS, ST, SV]

billing_code.description: Billing code defining the nature of the invoice [F2, RE, ZAMZ, ZDCM, ZDDM, ZDEP, ZDEX, ZDRE, ZDRX, ZNED, YF2]

billing_type.description: Billing document type description corresponding to the Billing Code [Invoice, Credit for Returns, Amazon Invoice, Credit Memo, Debit Memo, Ex. Depot Invoice, Deemed Export, Depot Returns, Deemed Export Return, Non Ex.Depot Invoice, Export Invoice]

customer_name.description: Customer name to whom the invoice is billed

material_number.description: Material or SKU code sold in the transaction; use this column to join with the Material Master dataset.

material_description.description: Full SKU description of the material sold.

batch.description: Batch number associated with the material sold

base_unit_of_measure.description: Base unit of measure for the quantity sold [L, KG, EA] L = Litres, KG = Kilogram, EA = Each

customer_group_text.description: Description of the customer classification code [AA-CP, AA-DD, AA CNG Stockiest, INST-CP, INST-DC, OEM-FF, OEM-FW, OEM -Customer, EXPORT, E-COMM, OTHER, ENEOS-AA CP, ENEOS-OEM SF, ENEOS-OEM FF, ENEOS- IND, ENEOS-ENTI].

ship_to_party.description: Customer code representing the delivery location for the goods

region.description: Sales Region under which the transaction is mapped to [North, South, East, West].

item_category.description: Sales item category defining the nature and pricing logic of the invoice line [G2N, L2N, REN, RENN, TAN, TANN, ZDEP].

volume.description: Quantity sold for the invoice line item in LITERS. To convert to Kilolitres (KL), divide by 1000.

gsv.description: Gross Sales Value for the invoice line item before any discounts

cogs.description: Cost of goods sold for the invoice line item

total_bill_amount.description: Final billed amount for the invoice line item after discounts and rounding adjustments

contribution1.description: Contribution margin for the invoice line item calculated as Net Sales minus Cost of Goods Sold

rounding_off.description: Rounding adjustment applied at the invoice or line-item level

rtd.description: Rate or price difference adjustment applied to the invoice line item

cash_discount.description: Cash discount applied to the invoice line item

special_cash_discount.description: Special cash discount applied as part of promotional or contractual schemes

cpd.description: Customer promotional discount applied at the invoice line item level

ctd.description: Channel trade discount applied to the transaction line

ebd.description: Early bird or scheme-based discount applied to the invoice line item
